HTTP API Reference¶

This document describes the HTTP API of the gridt server. For the python API of the server, see Python API Reference.

GET /movements¶

List of all movements

Lists all movements on the server.

Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Succesful response
POST /movements¶

Create a new movement

Status Codes:
  • 201 Created – Sucessfully created the new movement.
  • 400 Bad Request – Could not create movement, because it already exists.
GET /movements/{movementId}¶

Get a movement

Parameters:
  • movementId (string) – Name or id of a movement.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Succesful response
  • default – Error payload
PUT /movements/{movementId}/subscriber¶

Subscribe user to movement

The user that is currently logged in will be added to the subscribers of this movement.

Parameters:
  • movementId (string) – Name or id of a movement.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Sucessfully subscribed to this movement.
  • 400 Bad Request – This movement does not exist.
DELETE /movements/{movementId}/subscriber¶

Unsubscribe user from movement

The user that is currently logged in will be removed from the movement subscribers

Parameters:
  • movementId (string) – Name or id of a movement.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK – Sucessfully unsubscribed from this movement.
  • 400 Bad Request – This movement does not exist.
